evidence.claim: MultiPlan utilizes AWS cloud services for scalable infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for handling patient data.
MultiPlan supports EDI transaction sets including X12 834 and 837.
MultiPlan integrates health data via FHIR standards for interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: MultiPlan engages in health data transactions, including claims and eligibility using X12.
matched_use_cases: data pipelines for efficient transaction processing
